The Multiplicative Latent Force Model¶

Describes the multiplicative latent force models.

Model Setup¶

Lists those methods relating to setting up the probabilistic structure of the model

MLFM_MH_NS.operator_setup() Sets up the NS quadrature operator
MLFM_MH_NS.phi_setup([phi_inv_scale_abs, …]) Sets up the x gp hyperparameters
MLFM_MH_NS.x_gp_setup([kern_type, x_kernels])
MLFM_MH_NS.psi_setup([psi_inv_scale_abs, …])
MLFM_MH_NS.g_gp_setup([kern_type, g_kernels])
